title: Software Engineer (Backend)
description:
We are looking for a Backend Software Engineer with strong skills in Python or Java,
experience with REST APIs (FastAPI, Flask, or Spring Boot), relational databases (PostgreSQL/MySQL),
and cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP). Familiarity with Docker, CI/CD, and microservices is a plus.
Responsibilities include designing scalable services, writing clean code, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.
